comments.body:
Created attachment 13111
Replacement for ajp.xml.PATCH (fubar'ed the author tag, sorry, this is the right version)

realm-howto.xml
Typo fixes. Probably ok.

ajp.xml
minProcessors/maxProcessors are at best deprecated.
The comment on security and loopback is wrong.

description:
Realm how-to:
Minor addition to describe the enhancements implemented as result of fixing bugs 29406 and 28631

AJP:
Adds attributes for minProcessors/maxProcessors, which I for one could have benefited from had they 
been present a few months back!
summary: Minor documentation additions for realm-howto and AJP
